description: A simple Twitter-like application that allows users to post tweets, follow other users, and view a timeline of tweets from followed users.
features_description:
- User registration and login
- Posting tweets
- Following other users
- Timeline view showing tweets from followed users
- User profile pages showing their tweets

fields.docs: The email address of the user

fields.name: name
fields.docs: The display name of the user

schema_tables.name: tweets
schema_tables.docs: Stores individual tweets posted by users

fields.name: userId
fields.docs: ID of the user who posted the tweet

fields.name: followerId
fields.docs: ID of the user doing the following

fields.name: followedId
fields.docs: ID of the user being followed
